## hpr1548 :: Heyu and X10

 
In today's backup show, Peter64 submits a devrandom segment about Heyu and X10 he did with Jonathan Nadeau. 


https://www.sonar-project.org/


https://accessiblecomputingfoundation.org/


A good place to look at modules ie the CM11 computer module, light 
modules, appliance modules etc


https://www.x10controller.com/kit.html


Heyu
https://www.heyu.org/


Domus Link
https://domus.link.co.pt/


Android App
https://www.appszoom.com/android_applications/tools/domuslink_yjlt.html
